title: Pixel 3 stuck in fastboot mode. Menu does not work -- only comes back to fastbook screen. Status
content: Pretty much everything.  Tried all menu items, start, recovery, all the others.  Status went from "error" to "locked."  Currently poor little android guy is on its back with a red triangle with ! point in in and "not command" underneath.  Have read many articles, nothing worked.  Currently am waiting for power to run out, recharge, and try then.  Thanks for help.
